‚ÄúBreaking up a monolithic application into micro frontends may help to change technologies for an existing application...without racking up much technology debt anytime there is a change in the existing application.‚Äù (Ehsan Motamedi) #microfrontends

I watch with excitement when the open source community comes onboard to tackle one of the biggest challenges in the #Microfrontends paradigm:

Caching!
